author: Reuters Editorial
title: Czech finance minister says 2019 state budget might be in deficit -E15 newspaper
text:
PRAGUE, May 14 (Reuters) - The Czech central state budget might be in deficit in 2019, Finance Minister Alena Schillerova was Quote: d as saying in an interview published by the E15 daily paper on Monday.
In 2018 the budget is expected to be 50 billion crowns ($2.35 billion) in deficit, or 1 percent of the country’s gross domestic product. ($1 = 21.2730 Czech crowns) (Reporting by Robert Muller Editing by David Goodman)
